DOC.brief_summary: In Intensive Care Medicine , critical incident rare may result fatal outcome . High fidelity patient simulator commonly use training curriculum healthcare professional especially anesthesiology , emergency medicine , intensive care medicine . Several different course concept previously publish . As know recently publish data , 80 % critical incident field medicine cause human error . The author present study aim investigate effect two different course concept ( one address technical skill intensive care medicine address non-technical skill ) stress performance . Stress performance measure pre-intervention post-intervention test scenario .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Stress During Full Scale Simulator Training
DOC.criteria: Physician experience intensive care medicine . No experience intensive care medicine previously take part simulator training
